statement:
As in the entry, given a number field $K$, the class number of $K$ is
denoted by $h_K$.

Let $E/F$ be a $p$-extension of number fields and suppose that only one
prime ideal of $F$ is ramified in $E$ and that this prime is totally
ramified. Then $p|h_E$ implies $p|h_F$.

[HGM02]{} A. Fröhlich, *On a method for the determination of class
number factors in number fields*, Mathematika, 4 (1957), 113-121.

K. Iwasawa, *A note on Class Numbers of Algebraic Number Fields*, Abh.
Math. Sem. Univ. Hamburg, 20 (1956), 257-258.
